entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:56 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:56 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:56 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023
